resources.string: It might take a few seconds for your PC to wake up.
The ComputerManager service is not running. Please wait a few seconds or restart the app.
Failed to connect to the host PC. Please check if the host PC is still streaming.
The host PC returned an HTTP 404 error. Make sure your host PC is running a supported GPU, and no other remote desktop software is running.
&applabel; has crashed due to an incompatibility with this device\'s video decoder. Try adjusting the streaming settings if the crashes continue.
Your device\'s video decoder continues to crash at your selected streaming settings. Your streaming settings have been reset to default.
USB accessory usage is prohibited by your device administrator. Please contact your administrator to gain access to this feature.
Your current launcher does not allow for creating pinned shortcuts.
Video decoder failed to initialize. Your device may not support the selected resolution or frame rate.
Your network connection isn\'t performing well. Reduce your video bitrate setting or try a faster connection.
Something went wrong with your host PC when starting the stream.\n\nMake sure you don\'t have any DRM-protected content open on your host PC. You can also try restarting your host PC.
The host PC reported a fatal video encoding error.\n\nTry disabling HDR mode, changing the streaming resolution, or changing your host PC\'s display resolution.
Check your firewall and port forwarding rules for port(s):
Warning: Your active network connection is metered!
The host\'s concurrent stream limit has been reached. Stop an existing stream or increase the \'Channels\' value in &hostlabel; Settings UI.
Failed to initialize video capture/encoding. Is a display connected and turned on?
All sessions must be disconnected before quitting.
Slow connection to host PC detected.\nReduce your streaming bitrate to improve connection.
Incoming frame rate from network: %1$.2f FPS
Frames dropped by your network connection: %1$.2f%%
Gamepad type may be changed due to motion sensor emulation
Access to games and pairing information stored on Nexus

&applabel; needs to access data from &nexus;. Please grant permission for both apps to communicate with each other.
&applabel; is meant to be used together with &nexus; to play PC games from your mobile device. Do you want to download it now?
&applabel; needs the latest version of &nexus; to play PC games from your mobile device. Do you want to update it now?

Connection to server failed.\nPlease check your Internet connection.
To continue using Razer software and services you must first accept the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy agreement.
&nexus; is a full-featured game launcher designed to integrate with &fullapplabel;.
Allow &applabel; to access to the games and pairing information stored on &nexus;
To unlock additional functionality, &fullapplabel; requires the following permissions:
Allow &applabel; access to &nexus; game and pairing data
Stream ended abruptly by the host, please check if the host is still streaming and try again.

The native resolution of %1$s is not support for streaming on this device. The settings Display Mode has been reverted to Duplicate PC display, so please try again later.

Alternatively, you may also try changing Display Size scaling in Android settings and try again.
Your PC\'s connected display will be streamed to your device.

Your PC will create a virtual display matching your device\'s resolution and refresh rate of %1$s at %2$sHz and stream it to your device.\n\nAny screen connected to your PC will be temporarily disabled while streaming.

Easily mirror your PC screen to your phone for convenient access to apps and content anywhere. Enjoy smooth synchronization and vibrant visualsâ€”perfect for gaming, presentations, or multitasking on the go!
Extend your PC display to your phone for seamless multitasking. Use your phone as a second screen to view different content, ideal for productivity and gaming on the go.
Mirror your PC screen to your phone while the PC display turns off. Enjoy seamless access to apps and contentâ€”perfect for gaming or presentations on the go.
Limit screen resolution to safe area
Restricts display size to avoid device\'s front camera.
Force the video stream from your PC to fill your device\'s screen.
Requires your PC\'s connected display to hear HDR enabled.
Mute host PCâ€™s speakers while streaming
Optimize resolution, refresh rate, v-sync, and performance to match display settings.
Attempt to automatically close games when finished streaming.
Please ensure &hostlabel; is running on the same network.
To pair a PC, it must be on the same network as your device. Ensure your PC has &hostlabel; v11.0.+ installed and signed in with your Razer ID.
Enter the IP address of the host computer.
Please ensure &hostlabel; is running on the same network.
Would you like to restart &applabel; to apply your change?
There is no app to launch
%1$s is already running, would you like to resume or quit the game? All unsaved data will be lost.
Would you like to quit %1$s first before starting %2$s? All unsaved data will be lost.
